alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Lake County; Southwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 05 at 2:06PM PST until March 06 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. * WHERE...Southeastern Mendocino Interior, Southern Lake and Southwestern Mendocino Interior Counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 8 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Provide adequate shelter for outdoor pets or consider bringing them indoors. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Lake County; Southwestern Mendocino Interior
